transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir, good afternoon.
Customer: Ha madam.
Executive: Ha, Swati bol rahi hu. Sir, call kiya tha na jab aap drive kar rahe the?
Customer: Ha ha madam.
Executive: Ha, to abhi aap batao sir kya issue aa raha tha? Kya bol rahe the aap?
Customer: Price me madam jo isme apne ye catalog hai na isme rate hai na rate.
Executive: Ha, aapke products rate?
Customer: Ha, product rate ye sab alag alag nahi hai.
Executive: Ha, kya karna hai isme?
Customer: Inke jo item hai na in sabke rate alag alag hai.
Executive: Update karne hai kya aapko rate?
Customer: Nahi inko matlab bina bina price ke rakhna hai, price nahi likhna hai.
Executive: Achha bina price ke rakhna hai?
Customer: Ha, kyuki wo customer fir confuse hota hai, upar niche hota hai na madam.
Executive: Ha, to sare me price nahi rakhenge?
Customer: Ha ha bas jitne bhi sabhi me.
Executive: Jitne bhi sabhi me?
Customer: Ha sabhi me.
Executive: Achha, to price remove karne sir.
Customer: Ha, aur dusri chiz hai abhi one month ho gaya koi lead hi nahi aa rahi hai dhang ki.
Executive: To uske liye mai aapko guide kar de rahi hu sir. Aapke dekho jo bylead me matlab.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, ha mai dekh le rahi hu ki lead kitni aa rahi kitni nahi aa rahi hai. Sir, jaise mai dekh rahi hu.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Thik hai, aapne jo start kiya hai, ek second rukiye bata rahi hu. March se sir, sorry May se, thik hai. May me achhi bylead aayi hai, May me aayi hai. Matlab aapne jo bylead sir bylead aapke portal pe aa rahi hai. Thik hai, lekin jo consume kar rahe hai na, depend karta hai aap kitni consume kar rahe hai bylead. Thik hai, to May me bhi achhi consume ki hai, June me bhi achhi consume ki hai, July me bhi achhi consume ki hai. August me thodi si kam consume ki hai. Thik hai, fir September me aapne kafi jyada bylead consume kari hai. Thik hai sir, fir October me fir aapne ekdam kam kar di hai, bylead hi nahi consume kari, kuch kuch kari hai. Aur November me aapne, abhi to November start hi hua hai sir, November me abhi tak aapne nau bylead consume kari hai. Thik hai, to jis jis month aapne achhi bylead consume kari hai, us us month me aapke paas inquiries kafi achhi aayi hai buyer ki. Thik hai, aur calls bhi kafi, calls kafi kam aaye hai sir, calls mai dekh pa rahi hu, kafi kam hai call ka flow.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To agar aap chah rahe ho ki bylead aapke paas jyada aaye, hai na? Aur buyer aapko samne se approach kare. Mai dekh bhi rahi hu TrustSeal one year ki service chal rahi hai, almost achhi chal rahi hai service aapki. Thik hai, aur yaha pe, ek second aur mai check kar le rahi hu details aapki.
Executive: Mai aapke product line me kya hai, dekh leti hu.
Executive: Business, business to achha khasa hai aapki product line me sir.
Executive: To depend yahi hai sir jab aap consume karte hai na.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir, sun rahe ho madam?
Customer: Sun rahe ho madam.
Customer: Ha ha sun raha hu.
Executive: Jo bylead consume kar rahe hai na, wo GST verified wali consume kijiye. Thik hai, GST verified wali bylead.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Ha, aur ek to GST verified wali consume kijiye, dusri jo bylead aap consume karenge, wo buyer kafi purana ho IndiaMART pe, thik hai?
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Ab agar kafi purane buyer to bahut sare honge, hai na? Ab usme bhi aap ye kaise pehchanenge ki genuine buyer kaun sa hai? To jo genuine buyer hoga, wo aapko usme option ban ke aata hai. Aap online aa jao mai aapko ek bar dikha de rahi hu, guide kar de rahi hu. Aapko idea mil jayega kaise bylead consume karte hai. Maine aapko na mail pe ek link bheja hua hai.
Customer: Ok.
Executive: Check kijiye.
Customer: Ek paanch minute me madam ji aapko call kar raha hu zara.
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Paanch minute me aapko call karke sorry mai thoda.
Executive: Abhi nahi ho pa raha hai?
Customer: Ha?
Customer: Abhi mai kahi thoda dusri jagah hu to paanch minute me aapko call karta hu.
Executive: Achha dusri jagah hai abhi aap?
Customer: Ha safar me hu.
Executive: Achha, to fir mai aapko bata de rahi hu. Dekho, ek to GST verified wali bylead consume karna aap, thik. Wo ho gayi, dusri aapko wo wali bylead consume karni hai jo IndiaMART pe kafi purana buyer hai aur uski details dikh jati hai, usme likh kar aata hai available. Matlab IndiaMART ka jo buyer hai jo bylead consume karne aap ja rahe ho wo kaha kaha available hai. Wo usme sign ban ke aayega, mobile ka sign ban ke aayega aur agar uske company name hai to company name ka sign ban ke aayega, WhatsApp pe available hai to WhatsApp ka sign ban ke aayega, mail pe available hai to mail ka sign ban ke aayega, uski company ka address available hai to address ka sign ban ke aayega location ka, thik hai sir? Paanch, paanch.
Customer: Ha wo wo chiz to chalo mai maan gaya aapne. Par isme main problem aa rahi hai sir jo white metal se related hai na unse contact bhi puri nahi hai koi.
Executive: Aap achha ye batao pehle pan India me deal karte hai kya?
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Pan India me deal karte hai kya aap?
Customer: India me India me all India me madam.
Executive: Ha wahi all India me deal karte hai na?
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To iske liye thik hai mai apni call ek bar transfer karti hu, thik hai, Vasundhara madam ko, apni senior ko. To mujhe aap bata do fir kitni der me mai call back karu aapko?
Customer: Aap aap 15 minute me kar dijiye.
Executive: Thik hai. 15 minute me. Aur ye bataiye sir mai aapko try karti hu bylead consume karane ka. Thik hai, mai abhi aapko dobara se call karungi to isme bylead consume kara dungi aapko. Thik hai, aur iske alawa bylead ke alawa aur koi issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Nahi ye wo jo jaise wo app post hai na usme sab ye polyrising related sab wo lead aa rahi hai. Dusre metal ki white metal ki nahi aa rahi hai kehne ka matlab.
Executive: Achha, white metal ki.
Customer: Ha wo wo ha wo problem aa rahi hai. Jo hamare useful nahi hai wo hi nahi aa rahi hai. Unuseful aa rahi hai.
Executive: Mai product line bhi check kar le rahi hu ek bar. Dekho product line to.
Customer: Ek wo chiz hai jo price wala wo hata dijiye kyuki unse thoda dikkat ho raha hai fir.
Executive: Ha wo mai hata dungi aapka aur ye aluminium.
Executive: Kafi sari byleads hai aapki, kafi product line hai, aluminium Swami Vivekanand statue, aluminium elephant statue, aluminium businessman statue, in sab me deal karte hai na aap?
Customer: Ha white metal.
Executive: Aluminium Kamdhenu cow ka statue.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Aur bahut aur sab hai.
Customer: White metal aapko hatana hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi ye hai hamara main product.
Executive: Main product white material hai na?
Customer: Ha ha aluminium bolte hai na, wahi hai bas.
Executive: Sir white metal puja thali?
Customer: Inka matlab jo hamare display pe aap item dekh rahe hai na, ye jo product dekh rahe hai ye sab aluminium white metal ke bane hue hai. Thik hai?
Executive: Sir white metal ke naam se to kafi sare product already aapne add kar rakhe hai, mai category bata rahi hu. White metal religious statue, white metal statue, white metal animal statue aur white metal puja thali aur aur hai aapka. To ab ab mai only aap kaho to white metal naam se product add kar de rahi hu.
Executive: Thik hai, isse aane lagegi white metal.
Customer: White.
Customer: Nahi nahi madam.
Executive: Metal, hai na? Nahi nahi.
Customer: Ye to fir wo galat ho jayega wapas.
Executive: Nahi nahi white metal statue aap hai na aapke paas?
Customer: Ha white metal statue ke product.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: To bas mai add kar de rahi hu aapke paas.
Customer: Are wo ek bar bhaiya se baat hui unhone bola fir ye dusre me aa jayega fir. Ye dikkat ho jayegi.
Executive: Check kar le rahi hu. White metal statue.
Executive: White.
Executive: Metal statue. Metal and god. White metal animal statue. White metal statue. Sir add kar diya maine. White metal statue.
Customer: Abhi to ek hi problem hai ye milna humko lead is white metal related milni chahiye.
Executive: Sir jab aap consume karoge na to aayegi dekho ek to ye ho gaya, jo maine aapko bataya ki GST ek to filter lagate hai na filter ka idea hai aapko?
Customer: Filter to kaise matlab?
Executive: Matlab ki bylead jo bhi aap consume karne ja rahe hai, hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hello, jo bylead aap consume karne ja rahe hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To usme option dete hai filter ke. Waha pe jaise aap bylead ke tab pe jayenge, bylead ke tab pe aane ke baad me waha location ka filter rehta hai to waha pe pan India select kar lo aap. Then waha pe recently bylead jo aati hai to sabse pehle aap recent wali consume kiya karo to recent pe aao. Jab aap recent pe aaoge to wo jo bhi ek minute, do minute, char minute, ek ghante, do ghante pehle bylead aayi hui hai to usme se agar koi relevant hai wo consume karo. But agar koi bylead aapke liye relevant nahi hai to usko not relevant mark kijiye. Agar aap not relevant mark karoge to usse related bylead nahi aayegi aur agar aap nahi mark karoge to fir wahi bylead aayegi.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Thik hai? To aap jo bylead relevant nahi hai waha option aata hai not relevant ka to usko not relevant mark kijiye, thik. Dusri chiz GST verified wali bylead consume kijiye aur jo buyer IndiaMART pe kafi purana hai wo bylead consume kijiye. But ye jarur check kar lijiye wo buyer genuine hai ki nahi, genuine matlab ki wo kaha kaha available hai.
Executive: Thik hai? To pata chal jayega wo buyer genuine hai to ab wo bylead consume karo. Dusri second thing ye chiz hai ki aap jab bhi aap IndiaMART ke buyer se baat karte ho, thik hai? To uske sath sath aap apni company ki rating review ke liye bhi baat karo. Thik hai, waise to achhi hai aapki rating and review, thik. But aap aur bhi baat kar sakte hai ki hamesha aapki company ke rating and review achhi bani rahe. To jab aap is tarah se kam karoge na ek bar meri guidance pe kam karke dekho aap, maybe aapko kahi na kahi achha response nikal ke aayega. GST verified wali bylead aur jo buyer kafi purana hai IndiaMART pe aur jaise phone pe, email pe, WhatsApp pe, business name sab pe chize available hai uski.
Executive: Wo bylead consume karo. Saath ek hamari site hai ek trade.indiamart.com. Thik hai? Is site pe bhi jaake aap bylead consume kar sakte ho.
Executive: Thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai madam ji.
Executive: Ye mai WhatsApp kar de rahi hu aapko site, is site se consume kar sakte ho aap. Dusri chiz jo aapke jitne bhi products hai sabka price hatana hai kya sir?
Customer: Ha sabka hatana hai.
Executive: Sabka? To kuch ke mai yaha se hata de rahi hu aur kuch ke aap hata dijiyega, kaise? Thik hai?
Customer: Ha wo to mai bhi hata sakta hu na price to.
Executive: Ha aap aap hata sakte hai. Price, wahi edit ke option pe jaake na edit ke option pe jaane ke baad me waha pe price remove karke save kar dijiyega, thik hai save and continuing. But ye sir price hatana kyu chah rahe hai aap?
Customer: Wo madam kya ab jaise aur bhi parties hai na to confuse ho jati hai. Agar hamare jaise competition me koi dusra. Matlab price badhte badhte rehte hai kya?
Customer: Wo to hai hi abhi humse koi kam bata de to party udhar chali jati hai.
Executive: Achha. Kyuki IndiaMART pe aur aur bhi jude hue hai na.
Executive: Ha koi issue nahi hai waise but agar aap remove karna chahte ho to mai remove kar deti hu baki kuch aap remove kar lena, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai madam ji.
Executive: Thik hai aur ye jo aapki ticket raise hui thi call aaya tha utha nahi payi thi to ye mai ticket close kar de rahi hu, kar du?
Customer: Thik hai madam ji, ok.
Executive: Thik hai ticket close karne ke baad na aapke mail par ek link aayega CLM client feedback hota hai, thik hai to CLM pe aapko yes dena hoga, thik hai? To dhyan se yes pe click kijiye ga, thik hai?
Executive: Mai to mujhe call karna but samajh me aa jayega shayad aapko bas usse dhyan se yes kar dijiyega, thik hai?
Customer: Ok ok madam.
Executive: Aur aap batao mai thodi der me aapko kab connect karu video meeting ke liye mai aapko sari chize guide kar dungi ek bar fir se. Matlab jab mai screen share karke dikhaungi na aapko to jyada samajh me aayega aapko, aap batao.
Customer: Thik hai madam aap 20 minute baad call kar dijiye mai phone.
Executive: 20 minute baad, thik hai thik hai thik hai ok sir.
Customer: Thik hai ok.
Executive: Ok.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to remove prices from all products.

- Not receiving leads related to white metal.



Resolution:

- Executive added white metal statue category.

- Provided guidance on consuming GST verified leads.

- Transferred the call to a senior executive.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 20 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product catalog, price removal, gst, white metal
